heading: Real Stories, Real Results
subheading: Hear from homeowners who have transformed their retirement with Srenova.

testimonials.name: Marie Dubois
testimonials.quote: Srenova helped me unlock the value of my home while staying in the place I love. The guaranteed monthly payments have transformed my retirement, giving me both security and freedom.

testimonials.name: Robert Johnson
testimonials.quote: After 40 years in our family home, we didn't want to leave but needed additional income. Srenova's viager solution was perfect - professional, transparent, and genuinely caring about our needs.

testimonials.name: Claire Ricci
testimonials.quote: The Srenova team guided me through every step with patience and expertise. Now I have the financial security I needed without sacrificing the comfort of my own home.
